title: EVERYBODY KNOWS
lyrics:
Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme love
Byeol-ilado geuleohge boyeoss-eulkka? saeng-gag-e jamgin nunbich
Seulpeum eodinga-e meomchun geos gat-a
Bich-eul ib-eun chaelo haengboghan eolgul jinjiham-i ben maltu
Neoui nolaeneun naege sogsag-im gat-a



Cheoeum bon sungan I fell in love with you

Neoui gil-eul hamkke geodgo issneungeol

Kkum-eul ilwoss-eul ttae nan deo haengboghae

Jigeumboda deo usge modeungeol jugo sip-eo like that



Everybody knows neoneun molla naleul molla

Ne gyeot-e issneunde

Everybody knows neoman molla na eolmana

Neol gajgo sip-eunji

Neoui bich-i hwanhaejilsulog deo meol-eojyeo son-e dah-eul deus hande

Salanghandan mal neoui gobaeg neoui jinsim geugeol ttalagallae



Kkum-ilamyeon kkael su eobsneun jam igil nega bulleojuneun nolae

Eojjeom ili dalkomhal su iss-eulkka?

Jichyeo boineun neoui dwismoseub nege him-i doego sip-eo

Maeil naege neo geulaessdeon geoscheoleom



Cheoeum bon sungan I fell in love with you

Salang-ilan mallon I cannot explain

Ikkeuneun daelo nan neoleul ttalaga

Jigeumboda deo gipge nege ppajyeodeul-eo tto like that



Everybody knows neoneun molla naleul molla

Ne gyeot-e issneunde

Everybody knows neoman molla na eolmana

Neol gajgo sip-eunji

Neoui bich-i hwanhaejilsulog deo meol-eojyeo son-e dah-eul deus hande

Salanghandan mal neoui gobaeg neoui jinsim geugeol ttalagallae



My heart is broken neol gaj-ji moshaeseo

Onjeonhan naui byeol-i dwaejugil

Mannal su eobsneun segyeleul sal-aganda haedo

Baby please just stay, just stay



Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme love

Kkumsog-eseo neoneun naleul chaj-awa

Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme Gimme love

Jigeumboda deo balg-ge bichnajwo



Everybody knows neoneun molla naleul molla

Ne gyeot-e issneunde

Everybody knows neoman molla na eolmana

Neol gajgo sip-eunji

Neoui bich-i hwanhaejilsulog deo meol-eojyeo son-e dah-eul deus hande

Salanghandan mal neoui gobaeg neoui jinsim geugeol ttalagallae



Neoleul ttalagallae
